VOF with good credit (72), nearly new second-hand vehicle within limits

validationChecklist.whyNotExcellent: Credit rating 72 < 90, company years 6 < 5 would be ok but credit disqualifies

testUsers.description: BV with fair credit (55), 2.5 years old, 2 bankruptcies, new vehicle

Sole proprietorship (Eenmanszaak), low credit (38), witholdingObligation hit, 3 bankruptcies

validationChecklist.whyNotFair: Credit rating 38 < 50, 3 bankruptcies > 2, witholdingObligation hit, Eenmanszaak not allowed for Fair

generalRequirements.troubleWithPayment: ⚠️ true - requires manual review (Poor tier: No/Yes Manual)

testUsers.description: Inactive company, very low credit (22), sanction list hit, 4 bankruptcies, blocklist hit
rejectionReasons: Company status: Inactive (required: Active for all tiers)
Blocklist hit: true (required: No for all tiers)
Sanction list hit: true (requires manual review even for Poor)
Admin track record 0.3 years < 0.5 (min for Poor)
6 accidents not at fault > 5 (max for Poor)

testUsers.description: Non-resident, under 18, not administrator - multiple hard rejection criteria
rejectionReasons: Belgium residency: false (required for all tiers)
Is administrator: false (required for all tiers)
Vehicle HP 500 > 150 (max for Poor if insurance check applies)
